purpose: The email is a call for applications for the ERCIM STM WG 2025 Award for the Best Ph.D. Thesis on Security and Trust Management.
evidence_sentences: ERCIM STM WG then decided to establish an award for the best Ph.D. thesis in this area to increase the visibility of the young researchers within the ERCIM scientific community as well as in the scientific community in general.
Applications for the award in 2025 are open to all Ph.D. holders that defended their thesis during 2024 in any European University.

Applications consisting of the Ph.D. Thesis (in PDF format), a short summary of the Thesis (mandatory in English), a curriculum vitae (in PDF format), and letters of support from at least two researchers, one of whom should be from an ERCIM STM WG Institution, should be sent by July 31, 2025 to [log in to unmask] (Cristina Alcaraz).
